commit.message:
8305563: [vectorapi]: Initial aarch64 backend implementation for FP16 operations

This patch adds aarch64 (Neon and SVE) backend implementation for the
following FP16 operations for which C2 support was added in the commit
https://github.com/openjdk/panama-vector/commit/7460d9327aac7d1d2ba6aed4e7137a417dbf6a97
-

Unary operations : AbsVHF, NegVHF
Binary operations : AddVHF, SubVHF, MulVHF, DivVHF
Ternary operations : AddReductionVHF, FmaVHF
Conversion operations : VectorCastHF2D, VectorCastD2HF

Some of these operations on Neon machines, require features "fphp" and
"asimdhp" to be available. Feature detection for these features
have also been added.
